name: Call No Man Free
description:
For GMTK Game Jam 2020 

NOTICE: Does not work on monitors that are better than 60Hz 

A simulation of life under authoritarianism.  You gradually run out of control as your oppressive government tries to tyrannically confiscate your forbidden technology.  

WASD to Move  

Shift to Cloak 

I to Advance Dialogue

O to Use Hammer  

P to Climb  

Coding and Music by William Terlinden

 Art and Music by Juliana Covarubias
